title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Scientific Inquiry Through Film Production: Blended Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can produce a 2-minute short film explaining scientific principles using smartphones.
Learners can apply the scientific inquiry method (observation, hypothesis formulation, experiment design) during the filmmaking process.
Learners can improve the narrative and visual aesthetics of their science films three or more times through peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
